description: This is a Dart source file defining the AppTheme class, which provides a Material 3 theme configuration for a Flutter application titled 'AppTheme'. It includes color definitions and theme customization methods for light theme styling across the app.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing static theme data for the app, including color schemes and theme customization for Flutter Material 3.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured for light theme mode, customizing colors, app bar, buttons, cards, chips, and input decorations.
